text.__SUMMARY__: Fritillaria gibbosa is an Asian species of herbaceous perennials in the lily family, native to Pakistan, Iran, Afghanistan, Turkmenistan, and South Caucasus.Fritillaria gibbosa is up to 30 cm tall. Flowers are rotate (wide open and nearly flat) rather than bell-shaped as in most of the species in the genus, pink with darker spots.
